sentences.en: a child’s mental development
sentences.cn: 儿童的智力发育

sentences.en: Attitudes to mental illness have shifted in recent years.
sentences.cn: 最近几年对精神病的态度已有所改变。

sentences.en: Cultivating a positive mental attitude towards yourself can reap tremendous benefits.
sentences.cn: 培养一种自信的积极心态会让人受益匪浅。

sentences.en: He hanged himself two hours after arriving at a mental hospital.
sentences.cn: 在到精神病医院两小时后他就上吊自杀了。

sentences.en: He was transferred to Shoal Creek Mental Institution for an indefinite period.
sentences.cn: 他被转到了肖尔溪精神病院，要在那里无限期地呆下去。

sentences.en: Heggie was remanded to a mental hospital for assessment by doctors.
sentences.cn: 赫吉被押往一所精神病院接受医生检查。

sentences.en: Her mental capacity and temperament are as remarkable as his.
sentences.cn: 她的才智和气质和他一样出众。

sentences.en: Her poems are modishly experi-mental in style and recondite in subject-matter.
sentences.cn: 她的诗在风格上是时髦的实验派，主题艰深难懂。

sentences.en: His intellect and mental agility have never been in doubt.
sentences.cn: 他的才智和机敏从未受到怀疑。

sentences.en: Many enjoy the mental stimulation of a challenging job.
sentences.cn: 很多人喜欢富有挑战性的工作所带来的强烈的精神刺激。

sentences.en: Many suffered from a definable alcohol, drug, or mental disorder.
sentences.cn: 许多人都患有能够辨识的酗酒、吸毒或心理障碍。

sentences.en: Poor housing and family stress can affect both physical and mental health.
sentences.cn: 住房条件差、家庭压力大会影响身心两方面的健康。

sentences.en: She made a mental note not to sit anywhere near him.
sentences.cn: 她心里牢牢记着不坐在他的附近。

sentences.en: She made a mental note to have his prescription refilled.
sentences.cn: 她记着要拿他的处方再配一回药。

sentences.en: Stress has an effect on both your physical and mental health .
sentences.cn: 压力对身体健康和心理健康都有影响。

sentences.en: Stress has an effect on both your physical and mental health.
sentences.cn: 压力对身体健康和心理健康都有影响。

sentences.en: Susan had a mental breakdown and was diagnosed with schizophrenia.
sentences.cn: 苏珊精神崩溃，被诊断为得了精神分裂症。

sentences.en: The centre provides help for people suffering from mental illness .
sentences.cn: 该中心对精神病患者提供帮助。

sentences.en: The centre provides help for people suffering from mental illness.
sentences.cn: 该中心对精神病患者提供帮助。

sentences.en: The legal definition of "know" often presumes mental control.
sentences.cn: “知晓”的法律定义通常假定存在思维控制能力。

sentences.en: You need to develop a positive mental attitude .
sentences.cn: 你需要培养积极的心态。

words.tran_cn: 心态；[心理] 智力；精神力；头脑作用
心理状态；精神作用；精神活动
神经错乱的,失常的,古怪的

phrases.tran_cn: 心智能力；智能；心理能力
心智发展；心理发展过程
心智模式，心智模型；心理模型
n. 精神境界，精神面貌
智力迟钝；智能缺陷（等于mental deficiency）

trans.tran_cn: 智力的，精神健康的，疯狂的，极其兴奋的
trans.tran_en: relating to the health or state of someone’s mind
